Package edu.bath.transitivityutils

Utilities related to efficiently maintaining transitive relations.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Navigator<E> A set of elements for which it can be asked which other elements are related to them.
Relation<E> A binary relation.
TransitiveBiRelation<E> A bidirectional transitive relation.
TransitiveRelation<E> A transitive binary relation.
 

Class Summary
Navigators Provides static utility methods for creating and working with Navigator instances.
OrderList<E> A doubly-linked circular list, where pairs of elements can be tested for precedence in constant time.
OrderList.Node<E> This class represents the nodes of the linked list of an OrderList.
Relations Provides static utility methods for creating and working with Relation instances.
 

Package edu.bath.transitivityutils Description

Utilities related to efficiently maintaining transitive relations.

Based on ideas of " Efficient management of transitive relationships in large data and knowledge bases", implemented via the use of the first data structure described in " Two simplified algorithms for maintaining order in a list".
